div.h2: CARIN RTPBC Error Code Value Set

div.p: This value set contains the error codes to be used by real-time pharmacy benefit check servers when encountering an error that prevents processing from completing.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/us/carin/CodeSystem/rtpbc-error-code
CodeDisplay
no-patient-matchNo patient match foundNo patient match found
multiple-patient-matchesMore Than One Patient FoundMore Than One Patient Found
invalid-product-idM/I Product/Service IDM/I Product/Service ID

title.value: CARIN RTPBC Error Code Value Set

description.value: This value set contains the error codes to be used by real-time pharmacy benefit check servers when encountering an error that prevents processing from completing.
